node.title: Monarto Zoo investigates death of baby rhino, the third since 2017
node.alt: Monarto Safari Park after baby white rhino Eshe.
node.description: An investigation is underway into what caused the death of 15-month-old southern white rhino Eshe at Monarto Zoo near Adelaide late last week, the third death of a baby rhino since 2017.
node.content:
["Zookeepers remain mystified by the latest death of a\u00a0baby rhinoceros at Monarto Safari Park, with investigations expected to take weeks and possibly months.", "Southern white rhino Eshe was found dead inside her enclosure and near her mother\u00a0Umqali at the zoo, south-east of Adelaide, on Saturday.", "It is the third baby rhino death at the zoo since 2017.", "The 15-month-old, 700-kilogram, rhino died with\u00a0\"obvious signs of trauma\".", "\"All three are females and all three seem to have died of similar sorts of causes, maybe brought on by a blow to the side, a broken rib and the subsequent bleed,\" Monarto director Peter Clark said.", "\"It's all very perplexing, we don't know what's happened. Umqali's a good mother and she's always been really good and protective.\"", "Eshe's sisters Tundu and Imani both died in similar circumstances, at similar ages, in 2017 and 2019, respectively.", "Mr Clark said investigations would consider \"all sorts of things\" including whether there were genetic factors involved.", "He said the rhino's death was \"shattering news\" that had left zookeepers \"heartbroken\".", "\"Superficially it looks like an external factor, it looks like a trauma. She may have tried running through a gate with her mother and got pressed into a wall,\" he said.", "\"We are looking for other underlying reasons.\"", "Zookeepers became alert to a possible problem with Eshe on\u00a0Thursday, when she was spotted\u00a0lying down and largely unresponsive.", "\"She's normally pretty bubbly and running around everywhere,\" Mr Clark said.", "", "
Zookeepers are considering various possibilities, including genetic factors.(Zoos SA)
", "Foul play is not suspected, but vets are keeping an open mind.", "\"We've put in cameras and we've seen nothing to indicate there are\u00a0problems with roughhousing between mum and daughter, and even the daughter and the other females,\" Mr Clark said.", "Mr Clark said Zoos SA plays \"a significant role in ensuring the survival\" of the southern white rhino by building an \"insurance population\".", "Eshe's mother Umqali is displaying \"typical grieving behaviour, calling for her calf\".", "Eshe's was not the only death at Monarto on Saturday.", "African painted dog Jasiri also succumbed to advanced liver disease."]
